product_name: Columbia Switchback II Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Bring the highly packable women's Columbia Switchback II Jacket on your next picnic, hike or outing. It resists light rain and wards off breezes that may give you the chills. Omni-Shield(TM) advanced repellency resists moisture and stains. Drawcord hood stows in collar when not needed. Entire jacket stows into left-hand zip pocket. Mesh-lined back vent enhances airflow. Columbia Switchback II Jacket for women features adjustable hem and cuffs to seal out weather. Closeout.
short_description: Bring the highly packable women's Columbia Switchback II Jacket on your next picnic, hike or outing. It resists light rain and wards off breezes that may give you the chills.
